title: Fusion eSports Looking For Video Editors
body:
Fusion eSports is currently looking for 3 video editors to dedicate time to upload at least upload 1 video per week and then at the end of the month work with the other editors to make 1 big video to close out the month. Add me in-game or comment and we can talk.

IGN: FsN TK

replies.body:
me
and why was i banned?
IGN:breakordoom4444
